details.description:
We are experiencing technical issues with our telephone line. If you cannot reach us on our usual number, please call  +44 1908 516666.

Please note:

Our only official contacts are through:

Telephone: +880 2 55668700

Email:

General enquiries: Dhaka.Press@fco.gov.uk
Consular: consular.bangladesh@fco.gov.uk
Passport services: overseasnewportccc@hmpo.gsi.gov.uk

The Human Rights and Democracy Programme & Prosperity Fund central programmes project concepts or related queries should be submitted to:  Dhaka.Projects@fco.gov.uk

Customers Applying for Priority Visas (PVs): All customers applying for PVs are asked to ensure that copies of documents/passports provided in support of their application are provided on good quality A4 size paper.  This will facilitate the scanning of these documents.  Failure to do this may result in delays to their application.

UK Visa Information Bangladesh - User Pay Services. For more details - http://vfsglobal.co.uk/bangladesh/user_pay_services.html#3

All visa enquiries should be directed to our centralized Helpline – International Enquiry Service. For details please visit the website https://www.gov.uk/contact-ukvi-outside-uk

From 29 July 2014 if you are a British national in Bangladesh applying for a British passport you should submit your application through the UK Visa Application Centre in Dhaka or Sylhet.  Applications will then be sent on to Her Majesty’s Passport Office in the UK for processing.

You can find further details and other information required to make an application at www.gov.uk/overseas-passports.  If you cannot find the information you need on the website, please contact the Passport Advice line on +44 300 222 0000 or send an email to overseasnewportccc@hmpo.gsi.gov.uk.
details.access_and_opening_times:
Office Hours

  • Sunday-Wednesday: 8am-4pm (local), 2am-10am (GMT)
  • Thursday: 8am-2pm (local), 2am-8am (GMT)

At other times please call +880 2 55668700 and follow the instructions.

Consular Services

Open to the public:

  • Sunday-Tuesday: 9:00am-1:00pm (local), 3:00am-7:00am (GMT)
  • Wednesday: Closed
  • Thursday: 9:30am to 12:30 pm (local), 3:30am-6:30am (GMT)

British Nationals should call: +880 2 55668700 to arrange an appointment before visiting our office in Dhaka.

Telephone enquiries:

  • Sunday-Wednesday: 8am-4pm (local), 2am-10am (GMT)
  • Thursday: 8am-2pm (local), 2am-8am (GMT)

Passport Services

From 29 July 2014 if you are a British national in Bangladesh applying for a British passport you should submit your application through the UK Visa Application Centre in Dhaka or Sylhet. Applications will then be sent on to Her Majesty’s Passport Office in the UK for processing.

You can find further details and other information required to make an application here. If you cannot find the information you need on the website, please contact the Passport Advice line on +44 300 222 0000 or send an email to overseasnewportccc@hmpo.gsi.gov.uk.

Pension Services

Open to the public:

  • Sunday-Thursday: 9am-12noon (local), 3am-6am (GMT)

Telephone enquiries:

  • Sunday-Wednesday: 9am-2pm (local), 3am-8am (GMT)
  • Thursday: 9am-1pm (local), 3am-7am (GMT)

In case of emergency, you can contact the following number in the United Kingdom:

Telephone: 0044 191 218 7777

Fax no: 0044 191 218 7090

Email: TVP.Internationalqueries@thepensionservice.gsi.gov.uk

Public Holiday List

The following days will be observed as office holidays in 2018:

DATE DAY HOLIDAY
01 January Monday New Year’s Day
21 February Wednesday Language Martyr’s Day
26 March Monday Independence Day
01 April Sunday Easter Sunday
29 April Sunday Buddha Purnima*
17 June Sunday Eid-ul-Fitre*
18 June Monday Eid-ul-Fitre*
22 August Wednesday Eid-ul-Azha*
23 August Thursday Eid-ul-Azha*
21 October Sunday In lieu of Durga Puja*
16 December Sunday Victory Day
24 December Monday Christmas Eve
25 December Tuesday Christmas Day
26 December Wednesday Boxing Day

‘*’: This means that the actual holiday is determined by the moon, and may change

details.access_and_opening_times:
We have relocated our consular office in Sylhet. There will be no changes to our services to British nationals in Sylhet. As at present, consular customers will be able to access same services through prior appointment. We will continue to provide high quality consular services to our customers in Sylhet. The change does not affect our presence or reach in the area.

For appointment, please call the designated Consular Bangladesh number +880 2 55668700 or email: consular.bangladesh@fco.gov.uk to meet a member of the consular staff in Sylhet.
